definitions.title: n.[m]
definitions.body: a possession;—cstr. [[מוֹרַשׁ]] [[קִפּׂד]] Is 14:23 a possession for bitterns; [[וְיׇרְֽשׁוּ בֵּית]] [[יַעֲקׂב אֵת מוֹרָשֵׁיהֶם]] Ob:Ob 17 and the house of Jacob shall possess their possessions (but rd. perhaps [[מורישׁיהם]] their dispossessors, LXX Vulgate Targum al.); fig. [[מוֹרָשֵׁי לְבָבִי]] Job 17:11, i.e. my cherished thoughts (‖[[זִמּוֹתַי]]), but fig. is questionable, v. Di, who derives from [[ארשׁ]] desire, so Buhl.
